comment: This Swara, good for nothing, shez like Kangna part frm the other side. Isko kaam hai nahi, sirf bhadkate rehti hai.. aap log bina samjhe Twitter mein usko impress karte rehte ho. With so much of illiteracy, I strongly feel that we don't deserve democracy. It's anyways a myth.

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (g / good-04

            :ARG2 (n / nothing)
            :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (p / person
                        :ARG1-of (r / resemble-01

                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Kangna")))))
            :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01

                              :mod (o / other))
                        :ARG2 (p3 / person

                                    :op1 "Swara")))))
      :snt2 (a / and

                              :op1 "Israel")))
            :op2 h

                  :name (n5 / name

            :ARG2 c3)
      :op3 h

      :ARG2 p4

            :op2 "Ho")

                  :ARG1-of (s2 / strong-02)
